meta.@content: Model of Japanese trawler sunk by the USS Greeneville.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

-children.#comment: The bow thrusters are taken from a fan and grate example from Chapter 18 of the VRML2.0 Sourcebook by Ames, Nadeau and MoreLand.
All other textures are the creation of the Author or are in the public domain.
